author: AddictedToStyrene
title: Good for girls to play with or to find parts
review:
This is a neat little set for anyone who is building a doll's house type setup in Lego. It contains a fair amount of generic and specialised bricks in unusual colours, particularly as furniture and fittings - drawers, taps (faucets) etc. I confess - I bought it for the two R2D2 legs that you get. You can't find those in many sets! 
A good, inexpensive accessory set for girls playing with Lego, or parts freaks like me.
